data.name: Gemstone Defense
data.detailed_description: Gemstone Defense is a single player tower defense game where players can construct mazes that enemies will have to navigate in order to reach key checkpoints before they can proceed to the next area. Each wave, players will place gems to form their maze and select one tower (gem) to keep. The remaining gems are converted to mazing rocks which enemies will have to navigate around. Players can upgrade gem quality, build special gems and discover the best mazes and secret towers. Can you make it to the end?
data.about_the_game: Gemstone Defense is a single player tower defense game where players can construct mazes that enemies will have to navigate in order to reach key checkpoints before they can proceed to the next area. Each wave, players will place gems to form their maze and select one tower (gem) to keep. The remaining gems are converted to mazing rocks which enemies will have to navigate around. Players can upgrade gem quality, build special gems and discover the best mazes and secret towers. Can you make it to the end?
data.short_description: A casual single player maze-based tower defense game. Build the best maze and discover the strongest towers, if you can.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home
  • Processor: Dual-Core 1.6GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home
  • Processor: Quad-core 3.2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
